verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I belong to Jesus
I am not my own
All I have and all I am
Shall be His alone

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I belong to Jesus
He is Lord and King
Reigning in my inmost heart
Over everything

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I belong to Jesus
What can hurt or harm
When He folds around my soul
His almighty Arm

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I belong to Jesus
Blessed blessed thought
With His own most precious blood
Has my soul been bought

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
I belong to Jesus
He has died for me
I am His and He is mine
Through eternity

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
I belong to Jesus
He will keep my soul
When the deathly waters dark
Round about me roll

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
I belong to Jesus
And ere long I'll stand
With my precious Savior there
In the glory land
